text: Allan Stewart was a Scottish footballer who played as a right half. ==Career== Born in Kilmarnock, Stewart played club football for Queen's Park, and made two appearances for Scotland. He won the Scottish Cup with Queen's Park in 1890. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:Scottish footballers Category:Scotland international footballers Category:Queen's Park F.C. players Category:Association football wing halves Category:Place of death missing
title: Allan Stewart (footballer)
